headline: Edison International stock plummets as wildfires leave 70,000 Southern Californians without power
summary: Edison International stock fell 13% Wednesday after the company shut off power to tens of thousands of customers in Southern California as wildfires blazed through the region.

raw.headline: Edison International stock plummets as wildfires leave 70,000 Southern Californians without power

headline: Data centers drive growth, risk for PG&E, Constellation, NorthWestern: BofA
summary: Electric utilities that can increase earnings related to data center energy demand should see their share prices rise in 2025, according to Bank of America Global Research.
